channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gaming Worlds Could Be The Answer To AI’s Data Problem
item.description: Stanford PhDs Fan-Yun Sun and Sharon Lee cofounded AI research company Moonlake AI to help people "vibe code virtual worlds."

item.title: Kanastra: Private Credit Infrastructure Gets A Full-Stack Overhaul

item.title: Disney Hit ‘Freakier Friday’ Gets Streaming Date

item.title: Maker Faires Could Help IEEE Create The Future
item.description: Maker Faires are the sort of events that IEEE should engage with to attract the next generation of technologist, the people who will create the future...

item.title: Microsoft Unveils 50% Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Price Hike, New Tiers
item.description: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate now costs 50% more which Microsoft is trying to justify with new games and features added.

item.title: Recalculating the cost of convenience

item.title: Act now!
